analysis.description:
CryptoPoliceOfficerToken.addTokenLock (/unique_chucks/16/0x4bd3aac60b2e8893913b8398edda362e6b46dd98.sol#311-325) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- require(bool)(releaseStartTime == 0)

Reentrancy in CryptoPoliceOfficerToken.enablePublicTransfers (/unique_chucks/16/0x4bd3aac60b2e8893913b8398edda362e6b46dd98.sol#302-309):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(crowdsaleSuccessful()) (/unique_chucks/16/0x4bd3aac60b2e8893913b8398edda362e6b46dd98.sol#305-306)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- publicTransfersEnabled (/unique_chucks/16/0x4bd3aac60b2e8893913b8398edda362e6b46dd98.sol#306-307)
	- releaseStartTime (/unique_chucks/16/0x4bd3aac60b2e8893913b8398edda362e6b46dd98.sol#308-309)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/16/0x4bd3aac60b2e8893913b8398edda362e6b46dd98.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.23 (/unique_chucks/16/0x4bd3aac60b2e8893913b8398edda362e6b46dd98.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_address' of Crowdsale.addressIsCrowdsale (/unique_chucks/16/0x4bd3aac60b2e8893913b8398edda362e6b46dd98.sol#98-99) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_spender' of CryptoPoliceOfficerToken.approveAndCall (/unique_chucks/16/0x4bd3aac60b2e8893913b8398edda362e6b46dd98.sol#283) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_value' of CryptoPoliceOfficerToken.approveAndCall (/unique_chucks/16/0x4bd3aac60b2e8893913b8398edda362e6b46dd98.sol#284) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_extraData' of CryptoPoliceOfficerToken.approveAndCall (/unique_chucks/16/0x4bd3aac60b2e8893913b8398edda362e6b46dd98.sol#285-287) is not in mixedCase
